# This folder contains all necessary scripts and data to create the integrated data, run final models and produce figures 

## Data

### Chlorophyll
1. discretewq: [discrete water quality R package](https://portal.edirepository.org/nis/dataviewer?packageid=edi.731.5&entityid=6c5f35b1d316e39c8de0bfadfb3c9692)
2. ybfmp: []()
### Flow
1. Sacramento River at Verona CA (https://nwis.waterdata.usgs.gov/usa/nwis)
2. Sacramento River at Rio Vista CA (https://nwis.waterdata.usgs.gov/usa/nwis)
3. Yolo dayflow [inundation R package](https://github.com/goertler/inundation)
### Data Integration
1. Inundation: [inundation R package](https://github.com/goertler/inundation)
2. Temperature: [daily mean water temperature data publication](https://portal.edirepository.org/nis/mapbrowse?packageid=edi.1178.2)
3. Flow [f_load_flow_verona, f_load_flow_riovista, inundation R package](https://github.com/goertler/inundation)
4. Chlorophyll [f_load_chla](https://github.com/Delta-Stewardship-Council/swg-21-connectivity/blob/main/data_publication/R/f_load_chla.R)
